name: Overlord VR
description:
You are a mighty god trying to protect your quiet village of devout worshippers.
Now the evil spiders are attacking! Use your god powers and stop them!

This game was a four week school project at Yrgo, Gothenburg, made for the Oculus Quest.

Made by:
Amie Faily
Philip Åkerblom
Kian Parsa
Johan Appelgren
Robin Arkblad
